meanings.definition: A person who jumps on a trampoline for fun or exercise.
meanings.sent1: The trampoliners at the park were laughing and having a great time.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of trampoliners enjoying themselves at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The trampoliners bounced so high, they almost touched the sky!
meanings.sent4: In the sea of bouncing trampoliners, she stood out with her graceful jumps.
meanings.sent5: The image of the trampoliners in mid-air was like a painting of joy and freedom.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in trampolining as a sport.
meanings.sent1: The trampoliners trained hard to perfect their flips and twists.
meanings.sent2: Competing trampoliners showcased their skills at the championship.
meanings.sent3: The trampoliners in the competition were so skilled, it was like watching acrobats!
meanings.sent4: Among the trampoliners, he was a rising star, soaring higher with each jump.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the trampoliners to their sport was truly inspiring.
